sentences.sContent: On the other hand, absolute standards of poverty are creepy, reliant as they are on expert definitions of a nutritionally balanced diet.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the other hand, absolute standards of poverty are creepy, reliant as they are on expert definitions of a nutritionally balanced diet.
sentences.sCn: 在另一方面，贫困的绝对标准实在让人不敢恭维，因为它们是以专家定义的均衡营养食谱为依据。

sentences.sContent: Excess calories and fat undoubtedly contribute to this epidemic but another factor is that many manufactured or processed foods are not nutritionally balanced.
sentences.sContent_eng: Excess calories and fat undoubtedly contribute to this epidemic but another factor is that many manufactured or processed foods are not nutritionally balanced.
sentences.sCn: 过多的热量和脂肪无疑对这一流行有贡献，但是另一个因素是许多加工食品并不营养均衡。

sentences.sContent: GM technology has already been used to produce crops in greater quantity and of better quality — does it also offer a promising avenue to nutritionally enhance food?
sentences.sContent_eng: GM technology has already been used to produce crops in greater quantity and of better quality — does it also offer a promising avenue to nutritionally enhance food?
sentences.sCn: 转基因作物已经用来生产更大数量和更高质量的作物，它也会成为一条改善食物营养的大有希望的通途吗？

words.tran: 有营养的；滋养的；有营养成份的；与营养有关的
